title: Project Management Application
description: Developed for company XYZ, Admins can manage projects, track tasks, and handle team members.

title: School Admin Desktop Application

title: Minishell
description: A simplified version of a Unix shell, developed as part of the 42 coding curriculum. It features a command-line interface where users can execute various commands, manage processes, and interact with the system.
